name: Border Army Final War
description:
Border Army Final War is based on war on border army base camp. Player will have to face enemies on border army camp. Protect your base camp from enemy attack and shoot all terrorist enemies. Player will have multiple types of guns, with wide range of damage, accuracy and speed. Basic gun will available on start of game and other guns will be locked.
Multiple environments are added. 20 exciting and challenging levels are waiting for you. Complete missions of saving army camp and won the war against enemies. Enemy attacks will be of multiple types. Like, soldier attack, attack with vehicles, and even with helicopters. Player will have limited bullets to hit all enemies. So, player have to aim and shoot perfectly. Multiple weapons like guns, rocket launchers can be unlocked to shoot enemies and to complete missions. Complete more levels, earn more coins, unlock more guns and have more shooting fun in this game.
Border army final war is exciting shooting fun for everyone. Eye-catching color combinations and fantastic will increase fun for many times.
Features
Exciting 20 Levels
Challenging Missions
Totally free to play but in-app purchases added
Easy Game Play
Off line Game
